name: NEW - Director's Cut
description:
NEW - Director's Cut is a modification for the OFF fangame NEW by the individual IV. 

It should be noted that throughout the progress of this fanwork, the original creator was contacted on various occasions and has approved of its publication and upload. Once again, he can be found here.

Playing NEW beforehand is not required, as this mod is a complete overhaul. Basically.

Cut Content Featured:

Director's Cut was constructed by adding scrapped elements from an old demo of NEW into the mold of the modern game. 

  • Outdated graphics!
  • Unused enemies!
  • Unused music!
  • Unused areas!
  • Atrocious dialogue!
  • A cat!

Now doesn't THAT just sound like a fun party?!

CCF* Specifics:

*please refer to the header above this one.

  • Zone 3 has two whole parts added on to it! TWO!! How exciting!
  • An absolutely overpowered item you can get ~30 minutes into the game!
  • At least two new boss battles, challenging as ever!
  • ...And more! I can' t remember everything!
